name: Pure Functions
description: The class of functions that have no side effects (e.g., no I/O, no modification of external state) and whose output depends only on their input.

structural_witnesses.description: No file I/O operations (e.g., open(), print())
No modification of global or non-local variables
Return value depends only on arguments
structural_witnesses.example: def add(a, b): return a + b
